description_v1: PMXG was founded on June 23, 2005, our team has over 25 years of experience and recognition in the Precious Metals Market. Our experience has allowed us to develop a work philosophy based on the client needs.
description_v2: That is why all of our processes have been designed with our client’s different needs in mind, offering tailored solutions and providing permanent support at each stage of the process, helping them to achieve a successful internationalization process.
description_v3: From the city of Doral, in South Florida, we serve different markets, from small to large mining companies, as well as precious metal merchants, mainly from Latin America and the United States.
transparency-message: Integrity and honesty in all our processes.
security-message: We establish business relationships based on mutual trust.
service-message: Accurate processes designed to optimize time and costs.
who-we-are_message: PMXG is a company that was founded in 2005, our team has over 25 years of experience and recognition in the Precious Metals Market. This experience that has allowed us to develop a work philosophy based on better serving our client.
sell-gold-silver: Sale of fine gold and silver
our-services_message: PMXG is the best option in the precious metal industry in South Florida.

subtitle.content: – We buy Gold, Silver, and Platinum at Market prices or London closing.
– We sell precious metals to the industry.
- We offer agile and precise fire analysis.
- Utilizing modern induction equipment, we guarantee a minimum percentage of shrinkage in our processes.

services-list.title: Consulting and support in International Commerce

subtitle.content: - Permanent consulting and suuport in the internationalization processes for companies wishing to export for the first time.
- Anti-Money Laundering Program that works to strengthen both parties in a detailed and complete way.

contact-subtitle: Please click on the button to contact us!
